p: Finally, because K63-linked ubiquitination is a docking site for mediating protein-protein interactions or conformational changes ( 55), we examined whether METTL3 could regulate this ubiquitin-linked chain of 3D. HEK293T cells, in which METTL3 was overexpressed or knocked down, were expressed with Flag-3D and HA-K63, followed by IP and immunobloting. The result showed that K63-linked ubiquitination was increased or decreased significantly by METTL3 overexpression or knockdown (Figure 7E andÂ F). This result was confirmed by the increase in K63-linked ubiquitination when METTL3 restored in knockdown cells ( Supplementary Figure S9C).
